tool.name: tool_24

param.name: STATISTICS
param.dialogReference:
Crop Statistics

Table, input

The first column specifies a crop type id. The second column provides a human readible name for the crop type (e.g. 'potatoes') .The third column must be an integer value, though this value is not yet used by this tool. The following columns provide the yearly amount of each crop type [%] for a sequence of years.

param.name: KNOWN_CROPS
param.dialogReference:
Known Crops

Table, input, optional

optional

The first column specifies the field id as given by the 'Fields' layer. The following columns specify the crop type for each field and year and refer to the crop type identifiers used in the crop statistics table. The sequence of years must be identical with that of the crop statistics table.

tool.summary: This tool generates land use scenarios for fields under agricultural use based on statistics about the amount of crop types grown in the investigated area of interest.
